England: The Battle of the Standard, an engagement in which the English defeated an invading Scottish army led by King David I.
Poland: Death of Bolesław III Wrymouth; birth of Casimir II the Just
Spain: Siege of Coria (1138): Alfonso the Emperor failed to take the Almoravid city of Coria, Caceres. His commanding general Rodrigo Martínez was killed in the assault.
